reviews.comment: Lakmalsirimanna is the single best freelancer I've ever hired on ANY platform. If you think they MIGHT be the right person to hire, stop looking....they ARE the absolute right person to hire. The work is top notch and the communication is outstanding. 6 stars out of 5!

I don't have one bad thing to say about the order. It arrived within the chosen time, was carried out with the utmost professionalism, and even when small things were already missed, I asked for a revision, and very quickly I got the final result that I was exactly expecting. Invites anyone who wants to upgrade their business to use this product!

I am thoroughly impressed with the video that was created for me for the second time! After my first remarkable experience, I couldn't help but rely on the talent of this team once again. The combination of creativity, professionalism, and a keen sense of detail has amazed me once more.

The visual execution continues to be impressive, and this time, too, the team has exceeded my expectations. From the choice of music to seamless editing â€“ every aspect of the video was executed with the highest precision. It's evident that the team not only understands my briefing but consistently incorporates new elements that elevate the overall experience to a whole new level.

Communication throughout the entire process was again prompt and professional, making my experience even more enjoyable. I highly recommend this team and look forward to future projects!

Thanks again for this consistently excellent work!

I wish it turned out better butâ€¦He did not communicate effectively and did not deliver what I wanted or needed. Beyond disappointing and wonâ€™t be able to use what he made..

Lakmal did a great job designing my promotional video. We started with just briefly speaking about it, and then he just took off with it. Excellent communicator and wonderful experience. I will be using Lakmal again soon I highly recommend him!
It's always a pleasure working with you Lakmal! I look forward to the next one!
Very organized, excellent communication, and gave me everything I needed to get started. It's always a pleasure working with lakmalsirimanna! I look forward to the next one!
very good buyer.Thank you see you again
